text:
@GregAbbott_TX If Abbott opens up Texas businesses wo testing more ppl, get ready for a wave of deaths. Watch Texas hospitals fill up. Or just wait a week or 2 after Easter. See who went to church. #coronsvirus #covid19 🦠

If East Texas surges, then Greg Abbott w pay attention. Rural voters.
